app.title: World Letter River
app.tagline: Flow, learn, and celebrate every catch.

languagePicker.label: App Language
languagePicker.onboardingSubtitle: Pick the interface language and the alphabet you want to practice.

practicePicker.label: Practice Language
practicePicker.helper: Choose which language pack you want to explore.

hero.heading: Flow through all three river challenges.
hero.description: Keep your streak alive and claim fresh stars by completing the Warm-Up, Focus, and Spice quests tailored just for you.

modes.label: Choose your river
modes.heading: Pick a mode to begin
modes.subheading: Swap between letter drills and vocabulary journeys whenever you like.
modes.letterDescription: Catch drifting letters, train reflexes, and chase a new high score.
modes.wordDescription: Build complete words, then match them with their meanings.

languagePicker.label: Practice Language
languagePicker.helper: Switch anytime to train in another script.

setup.title: World Letter River
setup.subtitleFallback: Drag the moving item to the correct box!
setup.prompt: Choose what you want to practice:
setup.defaultModeDescription: Practice the main set of characters.

letters.label: Letters Only
letters.description: Practice the core set of letters.

vowels1.label: 'A' & 'O' Vowels
vowels1.description: Practice the Patach and Holam vowel marks.

vowels2.label: 'E' & 'I' Vowels
vowels2.description: Practice the Segol and Hirik vowel marks.

expert.label: Expert Mode
expert.description: Mix letters and vowels for an extra challenge.

summary.heading: Items Encountered
summary.empty: No stats to show for this round.
summary.weakestLinkDescription: Focus on this item next time.

instructions.assemble: Drag the floating letters into each word card.
instructions.match: Drag every completed word onto its matching picture.

emptyState.title: Word River is coming soon
emptyState.description: We’re still preparing vocabulary for this language. Try switching practice languages to explore the river.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Advance through each tier to collect stars. Every milestone fuels your journey down the World Letter River.
achievements.earnStars: Earn +{{stars}} ⭐ when you unlock this tier.
achievements.maxed: Badge fully mastered — enjoy the glow!

learn.title: Learn
learn.intro: Dive into curated lessons to master each letter. Fresh learning modules will appear here soon!
learn.body: Until then, keep exploring the river and check back regularly for guided practice sessions, pronunciation tips, and cultural insights.

steadyStreak.name: Streak Keeper
steadyStreak.summary: Log in and play on consecutive days.

gemChaser.name: Gem Chaser
gemChaser.summary: Win bonus rounds and gather river gems.

warmup.title: Warm-Up
warmup.description: Play two quick runs to stir the current.

spice.title: Spice
spice.description: Win a round with the {{constraint}} active.
